Text:
Hi guys  :)

Please do me a favour after you have listened to this release & give it a rating on a scale of 1 - 5 (1 = crap & 5 = Excellent)

Just to satisfy my curiosity  ;)

I give this a 4.  I think it's a great album! It's got a little extra heaviness in a lot of the guitar work, which is a little different for them, but still the album rocks.  Their latest album "Born Into This" is more of a "back to basics" album, which is great and is a little better than "Beyond Good and Evil", but this is still a great album!!  Thanks for sharing it!!!
